Learning_Organization_Payment_Configurat.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies the Learning Organization Payment Configuration to update. Leave blank when adding.

validation.validation: Enter a name that isn't already in use.

Learning_Organization_Payment_Configurat.description: Reference to the Supervisory Organizations selected for the Learning Organization Payment Configuration

validation.validation: You don't have access to add or remove supervisory organizations. Update the request to exactly reflect any currently specified supervisory organizations.
You must remove these supervisory organizations from their current learning organization payment configurations before you can apply a new payment configuration: [super orgs]

Your Workday administrator must enable pricing for the Worker person type via Tenant Setup, before you can add or remove supervisory organizations. Update the request to exactly reflect any currently specified supervisory organizations.

Extended_Enterprise_AffiliationObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Organization_Payment_Configurat.description: Reference to the Extended Enterprise Affiliations selected for the Learning Organization Payment Configuration

validation.validation: You must remove these extended enterprise affiliations from their current learning organization payment configurations before you can apply a new payment configuration: [affiliations]

Your Workday administrator must enable pricing for the Extended Enterprise Learner person type via Tenant Setup, before you can add or remove extended enterprise affiliations. Update the request to exactly reflect any currently specified extended enterprise affiliations.
You don't have access to add or remove extended enterprise affiliations. Update the request to exactly reflect any currently specified extended enterprise affiliations.

description: Contains detailed information about a Learning Organization Payment Configuration. Learning Organizations and Extended Enterprise Affiliations will follow the "flush and fill" policy: all existing data will be replaced by the data in the request.
